body_html: This seems very similar to Atrous Convolution (Paper) for which keras has a Tensorflow implementation (https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/backend/tensorflow_backend.py#L1739)
body_text: This seems very similar to Atrous Convolution (Paper) for which keras has a Tensorflow  implementation (https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/backend/tensorflow_backend.py#L1739)
body: This seems very similar to Atrous Convolution ([Paper]( http://arxiv.org/abs/1606.00915)) for which keras has a Tensorflow  implementation ([https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/backend/tensorflow_backend.py#L1739](https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/backend/tensorflow_backend.py#L1739))
